author: Arnoldo Perez
text: Does anyone have a template or game plan for special projects like employee award banquet?  Cities have used these types of special events as professional development for up and coming members of the management team from within the various city departments.  It’s a learning experience for the employee on how to develop, manage a budget, committee work and all within an appropriate time frame.    I am interested what a city would provide the selected employee to accomplish the special project or event.
title: Special Projects Template
